select * from ( select u.id, m.id mid, s.id shopid, u.account account, ui.name userName, ifnull(s.name,ui.company) shopName, u.createDate, m.losingEffect, m.remark, ui.tel telephone, ui.email email, tr.name tariffpackage, tr.id tfid, u.losingEffect userlocsingEffect, u.`disable` isdisable , v2.subuser , case when v2.lastlogintime is not null and u.lastlogintime < v2.lastlogintime then v2.lastlogintime else u.lastlogintime end lastlogintime, ifnull(( vvlg.countnum ),0) logincount, (select group_concat(r.name) from t_user_role ur left join t_role r on r.id=ur.role_id where ur.user_id=u.id
AND r.id=#{param.roleid,jdbcType=CHAR} ) roles from t_user u left join t_userinfo ui on ui.id=u.id left join t_user_shop us on us.user_id=u.id left join t_shop s on s.id=us.shop_id left join t_manager_limit m on m.shopId=s.id left join t_sys_tariff_packages tr on tr.id=m.tariffpackage left join ( SELECT case when zu.leader_id=#{param.adminid,jdbcType=CHAR} then zu.id else zu.leader_id end userid, COUNT(zlg.id) countnum from t_sys_operationlog zlg LEFT JOIN t_user zu ON zu.id=zlg.userid WHERE method='com.plum.frame.controller.LoginController.pageAction()' AND zlg.time>DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 10 day) group by case when zu.leader_id=#{param.adminid,jdbcType=CHAR} then zu.id else zu.leader_id end ) vvlg on vvlg.userid=u.id LEFT JOIN( SELECT u.leader_id, count(u.id) subuser,MAX(u.lastlogintime) lastlogintime
,sum(case when u.account like #{param.name,jdbcType=CHAR} then 1 else 0 end) hassubuser
FROM t_user u where u.logicDelete!=1 GROUP BY u.leader_id ) v2 ON v2.leader_id=u.id where u.leader_id=#{param.adminid,jdbcType=CHAR} and m.id is not null and u.logicDelete !=1
and ( s.name like CONCAT('%',#{param.name,jdbcType=CHAR}) or ui.company like CONCAT('%',#{param.name,jdbcType=CHAR}) or u.account like #{param.name,jdbcType=CHAR} or ui.tel like #{param.name,jdbcType=CHAR} or ui.email like #{param.name,jdbcType=CHAR} or m.remark like CONCAT('%',#{param.name,jdbcType=CHAR}) or ui.name like CONCAT('%',#{param.name,jdbcType=CHAR}) or v2.hassubuser>0)
and tr.id= #{param.pkgid,jdbcType=CHAR}
) vv where 1=1
and roles is not null
